name: MouseEvent.screenY
description: The screenY read-only property of the MouseEvent interface provides the vertical coordinate (offset) of the mouse pointer in global (screen) coordinates.

refs.name: CSS Object Model (CSSOM) View Module
refs.description: The definition of 'screenY' in the 'CSS Object Model (CSSOM) View Module' specification.
